title: Will it affect the obsolescence of my device by not keeping it up to date? Does it not matter, or is the difference negligible? - Quora

response.answer_text: My advice: if your device is used to access services online, then you can keep using it as long as security updates are available and you are fine with some performance degradation that comes with software updates. However, if the manufacturer does not release security updates for a considerable time (like more than one year), then it might be time for you to change your device.
